content: <?xml version="1.0"?> <!-- $Id: keyhelper.xml 13884 2006-09-12 12:04:01Z lefevre $ -->  <!-- ~/Settings/keyhelper.xml - reload the keymap with "khctl reload" -->  <keyhelper>    <modifiers>      <!-- kanji = Ctrl -->     <define key="F26" type="Control">       <release key="F31"/>     </define>      <!-- byte = Alt -->     <define key="F21" type="Alt">       <release key="F25"/>     </define>     <!-- Fn+Shift no longer acts as Ctrl -->    <define key="Shift" type="Shift"/>    </modifiers>    <mappings>      <!-- Fn+6 = \ufffd\ufffd -->     <define code="200a">       <map code="00e9"/>       <map_unicode code="00e9"/>     </define>      <!-- Fn+Shift+6 = \ufffd\ufffd -->     <define code="200a">       <modifier Shift="On"/>       <map code="00c9"/>       <map_unicode code="00c9"/>       <map_modifier Shift="Off"/>     </define>      <!-- Fn+7 = \ufffd\ufffd -->     <define code="200b">       <map code="00e8"/>       <map_unicode code="00e8"/>     </define>      <!-- Fn+Shift+7 = \ufffd\ufffd -->     <define code="200b">       <modifier Shift="On"/>       <map code="00c8"/>       <map_unicode code="00c8"/>       <map_modifier Shift="Off"/>     </define>      <!-- Fn+8 = \ufffd\ufffd -->     <define code="200c">       <map code="00ea"/>       <map_unicode code="00ea"/>     </define>      <!-- Fn+Shift+8 = \ufffd\ufffd -->     <define code="200c">       <modifier Shift="On"/>       <map code="00ca"/>       <map_unicode code="00ca"/>       <map_modifier Shift="Off"/>     </define>      <!-- Fn+9 = \ufffd\ufffd -->     <define code="2007">       <map code="00eb"/>       <map_unicode code="00eb"/>     </define>      <!-- Fn+Shift+9 = \ufffd\ufffd -->     <define code="2007">       <modifier Shift="On"/>       <map code="00cb"/>       <map_unicode code="00cb"/>       <map_modifier Shift="Off"/>     </define>      <!-- Fn+0 = \ufffd\ufffd -->     <define code="2008">       <map code="00b0"/>       <map_unicode code="00b0"/>     </define>      <!-- Fn+q = \ufffd\ufffd -->     <define code="2014">       <map code="00e0"/>       <map_unicode code="00e0"/>     </define>      <!-- Fn+Q = \ufffd\ufffd -->     <define code="2014">       <modifier Shift="On"/>       <map code="00c0"/>       <map_unicode code="00c0"/>       <map_modifier Shift="Off"/>     </define>      <!-- Fn+S = \ufffd\ufffd -->     <define code="2018">       <modifier Shift="On"/>       <map code="00df"/>       <map_unicode code="00df"/>       <map_modifier Shift="Off"/>     </define>      <!-- Fn+Shift+t = \ufffd\ufffd -->     <define key="BracketLeft">       <modifier Shift="On"/>       <map code="00ab"/>       <map_unicode code="00ab"/>       <map_modifier Shift="Off"/>     </define>      <!-- Fn+Shift+y = \ufffd\ufffd -->     <define key="BracketRight">       <modifier Shift="On"/>       <map code="00bb"/>       <map_unicode code="00bb"/>       <map_modifier Shift="Off"/>     </define>      <!-- Fn+u = \ufffd\ufffd -->     <define key="cent">       <map code="00fb"/>       <map_unicode code="00fb"/>     </define>      <!-- Fn+U = \ufffd\ufffd -->     <define key="cent">       <modifier Shift="On"/>       <map code="00db"/>       <map_unicode code="00db"/>       <map_modifier Shift="Off"/>     </define>      <!-- Fn+i = \ufffd\ufffd -->     <define key="sterling">       <map code="00ee"/>       <map_unicode code="00ee"/>     </define>      <!-- Fn+I = \ufffd\ufffd -->     <define key="sterling">       <modifier Shift="On"/>       <map code="00ce"/>       <map_unicode code="00ce"/>       <map_modifier Shift="Off"/>     </define>      <!-- Fn+o = \ufffd\ufffd -->     <define code="2015">       <map code="00f4"/>       <map_unicode code="00f4"/>     </define>      <!-- Fn+O = \ufffd\ufffd -->     <define code="2015">       <modifier Shift="On"/>       <map code="00d4"/>       <map_unicode code="00d4"/>       <map_modifier Shift="Off"/>     </define>      <!-- Fn+a = \ufffd\ufffd -->     <define code="2017">       <map code="00e2"/>       <map_unicode code="00e2"/>     </define>      <!-- Fn+A = \ufffd\ufffd -->     <define code="2017">       <modifier Shift="On"/>       <map code="00c2"/>       <map_unicode code="00c2"/>       <map_modifier Shift="Off"/>     </define>      <!-- Fn+d = \ufffd\ufffd -->     <define key="yen">       <map code="00f9"/>       <map_unicode code="00f9"/>     </define>      <!-- Fn+D = \ufffd\ufffd -->     <define key="yen">       <modifier Shift="On"/>       <map code="00d9"/>       <map_unicode code="00d9"/>       <map_modifier Shift="Off"/>     </define>      <!-- Fn+Shift+f = Ctrl+\\ (SIGQUIT) -->     <define key="Backslash">       <modifier Shift="On"/>       <map code="001c"/>       <map_unicode code="001c"/>       <map_modifier Shift="Off"/>     </define>      <!-- Fn+k = \ufffd\ufffd -->     <define code="2022">       <map code="00e7"/>       <map_unicode code="00e7"/>     </define>      <!-- Fn+K = \ufffd\ufffd -->     <define code="2022">       <modifier Shift="On"/>       <map code="00c7"/>       <map_unicode code="00c7"/>       <map_modifier Shift="Off"/>     </define>      <!-- Fn+m = \ufffd\ufffd -->     <define code="201a">       <map code="00ef"/>       <map_unicode code="00ef"/>     </define>      <!-- Fn+M = \ufffd\ufffd -->     <define code="201a">       <modifier Shift="On"/>       <map code="00cf"/>       <map_unicode code="00cf"/>       <map_modifier Shift="Off"/>     </define>      <!-- Fn+Shift+- = Ctrl+_ (useful for Emacs) -->     <define key="At">       <modifier Shift="On"/>       <map code="001f"/>       <map_unicode code="001f"/>       <map_modifier Shift="Off"/>     </define>      <!-- Shift+Backspace = Insert -->     <define key="Backspace">       <modifier Shift="On"/>       <map key="Insert"/>       <map_modifier Shift="Off"/>     </define>      <!-- Shift+Space = nbsp -->     <define key="Space">       <modifier Shift="On"/>       <map code="00a0"/>       <map_unicode code="00a0"/>       <map_modifier Shift="Off"/>     </define>    </mappings>    <extensions>      <!-- Shift+Home = task list -->     <define key="F12" kind="select">       <modifier Shift="On"/>     </define>      <!-- Shift+Menu = task switch -->     <define key="F11" kind="switch">       <modifier Shift="On"/>     </define>    </extensions>  </keyhelper>
